title.en: Moto Gal Mama ga Kyuu ni Dekita Ken.

altTitles.ja: 元ギャルママが急にできた件。

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Gyaru Mama ga Kyuu ni Dekita Ken.

altTitles.en: When I Suddenly Got an Ex-Gyaru as My Mother.
I Was Suddenly Blessed With An Ex-Gal Mama

description.en:
Your old man recently got re-married to a 27-year-old ex-gal!

Their married life is going all swell, but frustrated from your entrance exam cramming, you start to sneak into her room late at night to release some steam... among other things.

(Source: DLsite)

description.ja:
ヒモ男と別れた勢いで登録した婚活サイトで、超年の差婚をした元ギャル・樹里亜(27)。
新婚生活は円満ながら受験でピリついた連れ子が夫の留守中、夜の寝室に忍び込んでくるようになり……。
